ygData.subject: Re: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I just purchased a nice weapon. Ogre War Maul ! 17 dmg, 50 Delay for 145 pp ! I thought since I do minimal melee, and more healing might as well have a
ygData.messageBody:
Well I just purchased a nice weapon. Ogre War Maul ! 17 dmg, 50 Delay for 145 pp ! I
thought since I do minimal melee, and more healing might as well have a slower
weapon but do a good amount of damage ( 35 a pop! ). I like it. Mike not be da best
( the 2h sword that is base dmg 40 + level of character is better ( no one can find
it either, Except ME !!!!!)) Just saying other things are good like the Bloodforge
and Midnight Maller. Ok Peace Out

Level 21 Cleric, Xegony, Tybit "La Fromage"

Mystik wrote:

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> i just say kewl like that because it's sort of a trade mark for me....ever since
> i was on local bbs's, i've been writing that way...heh just me i guess.....:P
>
> I.G wrote:
>
> > From: I.G <shadowtg1@...>
> >
> > ok I am not writing this to bash any one person or anything but...
> >
> > what the hell is up with the damn kewl shit??? what we cant spell any more?
> > I admit I have trouble spelling at times but this just really looks stupid!
> >
> > maybe I am just getting old or something.
> >
> > Jaxim
> >
> > >From: "Kris Becan" <phonic@...>
> > >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > >To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> > >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Weapons
> > >Date: Mon, 28 Jun 1999 14:49:57 -0500
> > >
> > >Ok guys I know I may be going off on the weapons here but my thought is
> > >that there are no really kewl Cleric only weapons in the game. I know this
> > >is ranting but hear me out. I know we aren't fighters but we are defensive
> > >players in the game. Why not give us a few defensive weapons. Weapons with
> > >random charges of some type of defensive spell. I know ya'll will all say
> > >well what about the screaming mace? Blah it does a whole lot of good for
> > >you when your not even supposed to be tanking right? Anyway, why not have
> > >that cast as an area affect yaulp? That would be much kewler and much more
> > >beneficial to the group. What do all of ya'll think about something like
> > >that? I'm not saying that the clerics in general are unbalanced in the game
> > >but what I'm saying is there are weapons that are class specific to most
> > >other classes but the clerics. Please give me your feedback. Please feel
> > >free to rant right back at me to... just don't be too harsh! :)
> > >
> > >**********************
> > >Human Cleric
> > >Ramsess De'Vizier
> > >Rallos Zek
> > >**********************
